definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Kentucky farms produce some of the world's finest pure breed horses.
sentences.chinese: 肯塔基州農場出產一些世界上最好的純種馬。

sentences.english: A rare pedigreed entrant in a summer of mules.
sentences.chinese: 在一羣夏季影片的騾子裏，這是一匹罕見的純種馬。

sentences.english: Syrah grape potential in Haras de Pirque's vineyards is shown in this Syrah Character.
sentences.chinese: 種馬園葡萄園設拉子的潛力盡現於此款葡萄酒。

sentences.english: This is the stud  naturalized from Britain.
sentences.chinese: 這是從不列顛引進的種馬。

sentences.english: Purebred horses are much more expensive than mixed breeds.
sentences.chinese: 純種馬比雜交馬的價格昂貴得多。

sentences.english: Where do you stable your pony ?
sentences.chinese: 你那匹矮種馬養在哪兒？

sentences.english: Something has gone terribly wrong with thoroughbred racing.
sentences.chinese: 純種馬問題存在很嚴重的錯誤。

sentences.english: You're good in bed if you make us feel like stallions.
sentences.chinese: 如果你讓我們感到自己像種馬，那說明你牀技很好。

sentences.english: I'm now a horse keeper at the stud farm.
sentences.chinese: 我現在是種馬場的飼養員。

sentences.english: They travel the stallion to different farms.
sentences.chinese: 他們將這些種馬運送到各個農場。

sentences.english: Just was allocated to company stallion of stallion class feed.
sentences.chinese: 剛到連隊就被分配到種馬班餵養種馬。

sentences.english: Just was allocated to company stallion of stallion class feed.
sentences.chinese: 剛到連隊就被分配到種馬班餵養種馬。

sentences.english: She was riding a thoroughbred horse.
I have the oldest thoroughbred blood in the world .
sentences.chinese: 我擁有世界上最古老的純種馬血統。

definition: lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
